Package com.warehouse.controller

Class CategoryController

java.lang.Object
com.warehouse.controller.CategoryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/category") public class CategoryController extends Object
A web application controller that handles HTTP requests related to the Category entity.

  • Method Details

    • findAllCategories

      @GetMapping("/categories") public List<CategoryDto> findAllCategories()
      Processes the GET request along the path /category/categories and returns a list of all categories as a list of CategoryDto objects.
      Returns:
      a list of CategoryDto objects.

    • findCategory

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public CategoryDto findCategory(@PathVariable Long id)
      Processes a GET request along the path /category/{id} and returns category for the passed id.
      Parameters:
      id - category id
      Returns:
      the CategoryDto object for the passed category id.

    • createCategory

      @PostMapping public CategoryDto createCategory(@RequestParam String name)
      Processes the POST request along the path /category and creates a new category with the passed name.
      Parameters:
      name - category name.
      Returns:
      a CategoryDto object for the created category.

    • editCategory

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public CategoryDto editCategory(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam String name)
      Processes the PUT request along the path /category/{id} and changes the name of the category with the passed ID.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the category that needs to be changed.
      name - new category name.
      Returns:
      a CategoryDto object for the edited category.

    • deleteCategory

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteCategory(@PathVariable Long id)
      Processes the DELETE request along the path /category/{id} and deletes the category with the passed ID.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the category that needs to be deleted.

    • deleteAllCategories

      @DeleteMapping public void deleteAllCategories()
      Processes the DELETE request along the path /category and deletes all categories.
